summary.description:
Genome-wide characterization and evolutionary analysis of heat shock transcription factors (HSFs) to reveal their potential role under abiotic stresses in radish (Raphanus sativus L.).

General Information about HEATSTER.

Abbreviations of HSF domains and sequence motifs.

The HEATSTER database contains the full length amino acid and open reading frame nucleotide sequences of heat stress transcription factors (HSFs) compiled for plant species with completed or far advanced genome sequencing projects. The initial version includes 23 angiosperm species with 17 eudicots and 6 monocots and was extended by including additional 10 species in January 2014. The collection will be extended in the future as soon as more annotated whole genome sequencing projects will become available.
